channel.title: Never Was » podcast
channel.itunes:summary:
Never Was is an experiment in Internet and Podcast publishing. Each week I will release a new episode from one of my podcast novels; or a short story.
Current Podcast Novel: Chasing Shadows
channel.itunes:author: Terrence McLean

item.title: EP060 - Chasing Shadows - 12
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: This episode contains Part 12 of the Podcast Novel “Chasing Shadows”. Shalli, Kallen and Jalyn catch up to the demon they have been chasing but find that things are not quite what they expected. The battle turns bad for them but a help arrives in a surprise form. Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by [...]
item.content:encoded:
This episode contains Part 12 of the Podcast Novel “Chasing Shadows”.

Shalli, Kallen and Jalyn catch up to the demon they have been chasing but find that things are not quite what they expected.  The battle turns bad for them but a help arrives in a surprise form.

Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.

Readers: JerryD, Laieanna, Paul French

Shalli, Kallen and Jalyn catch up to the demon they have been chasing but find that things are not quite what they expected.nbsp; The battle turns bad for them but a help arrives in a surprise form.
Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.
Readers: JerryD, Laieanna, Paul French

item.title: Update
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: Some of you may have noticed that they site was down today. That was totally my fault, apparently I forgot to renew my domain and so today it expired. It quickly figured out the issue and renewed my domain, but it was a few hours before everything was back to normal and may still be [...]
item.content:encoded:
Some of you may have noticed that they site was down today.  That was totally my fault, apparently I forgot to renew my domain and so today it expired.  It quickly figured out the issue and renewed my domain, but it was a few hours before everything was back to normal and may still be down for some as the DNS propagates out.

I am working on the next episode, I have most of it recorded just need to edit.  My plan is to have Chasing Shadows done by the end of October.  I am doing things differently with the next book, planning on having at least half records and edited before I launch sometime early in January.

This next book will bring Shadow Hunter to a close.  When it is done, my plan is to turn back to Buried in the Sand.  I am working on something different here and will be looking for a lot more input from you.  I hope you’ll be ready and willing to help out.  I’m hopefully going to have the ground work for that done by the end of October as well.

Thank for sticking with me through my inconsistent release of Chasing Shadows.  I am working to make sure that Shadows Fall does not suffer the same pain.

item.title: EP056 - Chasing Shadows - 8

item.description: This episode contains Part 7 of the Podcast Novel “Chasing Shadows”. Landra faces Master Ijal over her ommision. item.title: EP053 - Chasing Shadows - 5
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: This episode contains Part 5 of the Podcast Novel “Chasing Shadows”. Sorry for the long delay, the cough I had from my cold has held on a long time. I even had some problems recording this episode because of it. I hope to do more recording shortly and have another episode up quickly. Kallen and Shalli [...]
item.content:encoded:
This episode contains Part 5 of the Podcast Novel “Chasing Shadows”.  Sorry for the long delay, the cough I had from my cold has held on a long time.  I even had some problems recording this episode because of it.  I hope to do more recording shortly and have another episode up quickly.

Kallen and Shalli start their chase and Zatle plots its next move.

Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.

Readers: JerryD, Laieanna, Paul French
item.itunes:subtitle: This episode contains Part 5 of the Podcast Novel "Chasing Shadows".nbsp; Sorry for the long delay, the cough I had from my cold has held ...
item.itunes:summary:
This episode contains Part 5 of the Podcast Novel "Chasing Shadows".nbsp; Sorry for the long delay, the cough I had from my cold has held on a long time.nbsp; I even had some problems recording this episode because of it.nbsp; I hope to do more recording shortly and have another episode up quickly.
Kallen and Shalli start their chase and Zatle plots its next move.
Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.
Readers: JerryD, Laieanna, Paul French
item.itunes:author: Terrence McLean

item.title: Never Was Promo - Chasing Shadows
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: I am happy to announce that on May 15th, 2008 my new Podcast Novel will begin, Chasing Shadows. This novel continues the story from Shadow Hunter and continues to follow Shalli as she now begins the chase to find Zatle before it is too late. Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune. Note: [...]
item.content:encoded:
I am happy to announce that on May 15th, 2008 my new Podcast Novel will begin, Chasing Shadows. This novel continues the story from Shadow Hunter and continues to follow Shalli as she now begins the chase to find Zatle before it is too late.

Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.

Note: I still have openings for readers

The chase begins May 15th, 2008
item.itunes:subtitle: I am happy to announce that on May 15th, 2008 my new Podcast Novel will begin, Chasing Shadows. This novel continues the story from ...
item.itunes:summary:
I am happy to announce that on May 15th, 2008 my new Podcast Novel will begin, Chasing Shadows. This novel continues the story from Shadow Hunter and continues to follow Shalli as she now begins the chase to find Zatle before it is too late.
Music, Something about Eve by Falling You provided by Magnatune.
Note: I still have openings for readers
The chase begins May 15th, 2008
item.itunes:author: Terrence McLean

item.title: EP048 - Short Shorties 5
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: This episode contains the short story “A Small Price to Pay”. I’m still looking for a couple of guest readers for a pair of short parts in “Chasing Shadows”. I preparing to send out text to the readers this week and hope to start Part 2 of Shadow Hunter soon.
item.content:encoded:
This episode contains the short story “A Small Price to Pay”.

I’m still looking for a couple of guest readers for a pair of short parts in “Chasing Shadows”. I preparing to send out text to the readers this week and hope to start Part 2 of Shadow Hunter soon.

item.title: Never Was Promo - Buried in the Sand
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: Here is the new Promo for Never Was and my new Podcast novel “Buried in the Sand”. If you have a podcast I’d appreciate it if you played it. Drop me a note and let me know you played it and I will mention your podcast or play your promo. 2000 years ago [...]
item.content:encoded:
Here is the new Promo for Never Was and my new Podcast novel “Buried in the Sand”. If you have a podcast I’d appreciate it if you played it. Drop me a note and let me know you played it and I will mention your podcast or play your promo.

2000 years ago the last human mage died. The elves refused to show the humans the secrets of magi again. New mages soon appeared possessing the knowledge of a corrupt form of magic. Seen as dangerous they are hunted by both humans and elves.

The necromancers gather and Blackthorn, most feared elf in the world, is sent to stop them; but for Blackthorn it will be his final mission.

Get “Buried in the Sand” at Never Was on July 27, 2007.
item.itunes:subtitle: Here is the new Promo for Never Was and my new Podcast novel "Buried in the Sand". If you have a podcast I'd ...
item.itunes:summary:
Here is the new Promo for Never Was and my new Podcast novel "Buried in the Sand". If you have a podcast I'd appreciate it if you played it. Drop me a note and let me know you played it and I will mention your podcast or play your promo.
2000 years ago the last human mage died. The elves refused to show the humans the secrets of magi again. New mages soon appeared possessing the knowledge of a corrupt form of magic. Seen as dangerous they are hunted by both humans and elves.
The necromancers gather and Blackthorn, most feared elf in the world, is sent to stop them; but for Blackthorn it will be his final mission.
Get "Buried in the Sand" at Never Was on July 27, 2007.
item.itunes:author: Terrence McLean

item.title: You’re going to get Buried
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: It has been a while since my last podcast so I just wanted to just you an update on what I’ve been doing. Over the past couple of weeks I have edited and prepared the novel “Buried in the Sand” for podcast. I have been working with a couple of other podcasters to [...]
item.content:encoded:
It has been a while since my last podcast so I just wanted to just you an update on what I’ve been doing. Over the past couple of weeks I have edited and prepared the novel “Buried in the Sand” for podcast. I have been working with a couple of other podcasters to help out with podcasting this novel.

I hope to be announcing a release date for “Buried in the Sand” within the next week, once I hear back from the other podcasters.

Once I start “Buried in the Sand” I will focus my effort onto “Chasing Shadows” in hopes that it will be ready to podcast when “Buried in the Sand” finishes. In my current plan “Buries in the Sand” should run 13 episodes.

item.title: The Status of Never Was
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: For the last week and a half I was on vacation. I had hoped to be able to get a significant amount of writing done while I was away. Unfortunately I was not able to get nearly as much done as I had hope to; my plan was to give a release date [...]
item.content:encoded:
For the last week and a half I was on vacation. I had hoped to be able to get a significant amount of writing done while I was away. Unfortunately I was not able to get nearly as much done as I had hope to; my plan was to give a release date for “Chasing Shadows” the second part of “Shadow Hunter” when I returned. With my slow progress on “Chasing Shadows” I am not able to yet give a firm date on when it will start but it is currently looking like it will not be ready until late summer (August/September) time frame.

Normally I would post a poll in the forum but, I wanted to ensure I got as much feed back as possible and make it as easy as possible. So I have posted the poll below. Please select the option or options (you can vote for more than one) that you would prefer.

What should I do on Never Was until “Chasing Shadows”?
Go on hiatus until “Chasing Shadows” is ready
Occasional Podcasts with Short Stories and other content
Podcast “Buried in the Sand”, a completed novel in a different world
Take submissions for other writers works
Podcast without stories until “Chasing Shadows” is completed
Work on getting an ebook version of “Shadow Hunter”
Work on getting “Shadow Hunter” on Podiobooks
Other (posted in comments)

Free polls from Pollhost.com

item.title: The Next Episode
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: I know it has been a while since my last episode, at least for me. The past couple of weeks have been very busy. For the next week and a bit we are going to be in Calgary so there will not be an episode before June 11. In that episode I will have a [...]
item.content:encoded:
I know it has been a while since my last episode, at least for me. The past couple of weeks have been very busy. For the next week and a bit we are going to be in Calgary so there will not be an episode before June 11. In that episode I will have a short story and I hope to decide then when I will start podcasting book 2, Chasing Shadows. I have been working on it for the past several weeks. Things started off slow but I have been able to write a lot in the past week or so. I’m hoping to get some writing time on our trip and on the plane and hopefully enough that I will be confident enough in announcing a start date.

Anyway, I’ll talk to you soon and as always thank you for listening.

item.title: Bad Feed
item.dc:creator: Terrence McLean
item.description: A little while ago I moved my web server and when I did I lost the setup for my other website the White Wall, because it uses a sub-domain. Last night I was doing some work on getting the site back up and running and by doing this I broke the Never Was feed. [...]
item.content:encoded:
A little while ago I moved my web server and when I did I lost the setup for my other website the White Wall, because it uses a sub-domain. Last night I was doing some work on getting the site back up and running and by doing this I broke the Never Was feed. Unfortunately I did not notice the problem until today.

The feed is now fixed. I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Terry
